1.name: Bastard Sword
1.appearance: A two-handed sword with a straight blade
1.description: A versatile sword that can be used with one or two hands for powerful slashes and thrusts

2.name: Dueling Sword
2.appearance: A slender sword with a tapered blade
2.description: A lightweight sword designed for quick, precise thrusts and parries

3.name: Falchion
3.appearance: A curved sword with a single cutting edge
3.description: A sword with a broad, curved blade designed for powerful slashes and hacking attacks

4.name: War Hammer
4.appearance: A heavy hammer with a spiked head
4.description: A blunt weapon with a spiked head for crushing armor and bones

5.name: Battle Axe
5.description: A large axe with two sharp blades, great for hacking and chopping

6.name: Flail
6.appearance: A spiked ball attached to a chain
6.description: A weapon with a spiked ball on a chain designed for crushing skulls and breaking bones

7.name: Longsword
7.description: A sword with a long, straight blade

8.name: Mace
8.description: A blunt weapon with spiked heads for crushing armor and bones

9.name: Spear
9.description: A polearm with a sharp tip for thrusting and jabbing at enemies from a distance

10.name: Katana
10.description: A sword with a sharp, curved blade designed for swift and deadly strikes

11.name: Morning Star
11.appearance: A spiked ball attached to a stick
11.description: A medieval weapon with a spiked ball on a chain, great for crushing armor and skulls

12.name: Rapier
12.appearance: A slender sword with a pointed tip
12.description: A lightweight sword designed for thrusting attacks, used for quick, precise strikes

13.name: Scimitar
13.appearance: A curved sword with a sharp blade
13.description: A sword with a curved blade designed for powerful slashes and sweeping attacks

14.name: War Scythe
14.appearance: A long-handled scythe with a curved blade
14.description: A polearm with a curved blade designed for slicing and hacking attacks, great for taking down multiple enemies

15.name: Halberd
15.appearance: A long-handled weapon with an axe head and a spear point
15.description: A polearm with an axe head and a spear point, great for chopping and thrusting attacks

16.name: Claymore
16.appearance: A large two-handed sword with a straight blade
16.description: A long and heavy sword with a straight blade, used for powerful sweeping attacks

17.name: Glaive
17.appearance: A long-handled weapon with a curved blade
17.description: A polearm with a curved blade designed for slicing and chopping attacks, great for taking down multiple enemies

18.name: Nunchaku
18.appearance: Two sticks connected by a chain
18.description: A weapon with two sticks connected by a chain, great for quick and agile attacks

19.name: Sickle
19.description: A tool-turned-weapon with a sharp, curved blade designed for slashing attacks

20.name: Whip
20.appearance: A long, flexible chain with a handle
20.description: A weapon with a long, flexible chain and a handle, great for keeping enemies at a distance and for quick strikes

21.name: Shortbow
21.description: A lightweight bow designed for quick and precise shots, great for hunting and skirmishes

22.name: Longbow
22.appearance: A tall bow taller than a person
22.description: A longbow with a tall, narrow frame, designed for powerful, accurate shots from a distance

23.name: Crossbow
23.appearance: A bow mounted on a stock, with a trigger mechanism for releasing the bowstring
23.description: A bow mounted on a stock, with a trigger mechanism for releasing the bowstring, great for powerful shots at a slower rate

24.name: Sling
24.appearance: A weapon that launches stones or other projectiles by means of a flexible pouch or string
24.description: A weapon that launches stones or other projectiles by means of a flexible pouch or string, great for quick and stealthy attacks

25.name: Throwing Axe
25.appearance: A small axe designed for throwing
25.description: A small axe designed for throwing, great for quick and deadly ranged attacks

26.name: Javelin
26.appearance: A lightweight spear designed for throwing
26.description: A lightweight spear designed for throwing, great for taking down enemies at a distance

27.name: Throwing Knife
27.appearance: A small knife designed for throwing
27.description: A small knife designed for throwing, great for quick and stealthy ranged attacks

28.name: Blowgun
28.appearance: A small tube used to fire lightweight darts or other projectiles
28.description: A small tube used to fire lightweight darts or other projectiles, great for silent, long-range attacks

29.name: Composite Bow
29.appearance: A bow made from multiple materials
29.description: A bow made from multiple materials, designed for powerful, accurate shots from a distance

30.name: Pistol
30.appearance: A handheld firearm with a short barrel
30.description: A handheld firearm with a short barrel, designed for quick and deadly ranged attacks

31.name: Composite Crossbow
31.appearance: A crossbow made from multiple materials
31.description: A crossbow made from multiple materials, designed for powerful shots at a slower rate

32.name: Blunderbuss
32.appearance: A short-barreled firearm with a wide opening at the muzzle
32.description: A short-barreled firearm with a wide opening at the muzzle, designed for close-range attacks against multiple targets

33.name: Recurve Bow
33.appearance: A bow with limbs that curve away from the archer when unstrung
33.description: A bow with limbs that curve away from the archer when unstrung, designed for powerful, accurate shots from a distance

34.name: Slingshot
34.appearance: A Y-shaped frame with rubber straps or bands used to launch small projectiles
34.description: A Y-shaped frame with rubber straps or bands used to launch small projectiles, great for quick and stealthy attacks

35.name: Boomerang
35.appearance: A flat, curved throwing weapon that returns to the thrower
35.description: A flat, curved throwing weapon that returns to the thrower, great for quick and deadly ranged attacks

36.name: Musket
36.appearance: A long-barreled firearm with a flintlock ignition
36.description: A long-barreled firearm with a flintlock ignition, designed for accurate shots at a distance

37.name: Tomahawk
37.appearance: A small axe designed for throwing or melee combat
37.description: A small axe designed for throwing or melee combat, great for quick and deadly ranged attacks or close-quarters combat

38.name: Dart
38.appearance: A small, pointed missile used as a weapon
38.description: A small, pointed missile used as a weapon, great for quick and stealthy attacks

39.name: Spear
39.appearance: A long, pointed weapon used for thrusting or throwing
39.description: A long, pointed weapon used for thrusting or throwing, great for taking down enemies at a distance or in melee combat

40.name: Assault Rifle
40.appearance: A selective-fire firearm with a detachable magazine
40.description: A selective-fire firearm with a detachable magazine, designed for quick and deadly ranged attacks

41.name: Staff of Fire
41.appearance: A long wooden staff with a ruby embedded at the top
41.description: This staff is imbued with the power of fire, allowing the wielder to conjure flames and ignite enemies

42.name: Sword of Ice
42.appearance: A longsword with a blade made of ice
42.description: This sword is imbued with the power of ice, allowing the wielder to freeze enemies and create icy terrain

43.name: Wand of Lightning
43.appearance: A slender wand with a blue crystal at the tip
43.description: This wand is imbued with the power of lightning, allowing the wielder to electrocute enemies and power electrical devices

44.name: Bow of the Elements
44.appearance: A bow with a string made of woven air and arrows that change elemental properties
44.description: This bow is imbued with the power of the elements, allowing the wielder to shoot arrows imbued with fire, ice, lightning, and more

45.name: Dagger of Shadows
45.appearance: A black dagger that seems to absorb light
45.description: This dagger is imbued with the power of shadows, allowing the wielder to move unseen and strike with deadly accuracy

46.name: Flail of Radiance
46.appearance: A flail with a chain made of pure light and a mace made of shining metal
46.description: This flail is imbued with the power of radiance, allowing the wielder to strike enemies with blinding light and heal allies

47.name: Scepter of the Mind
47.appearance: A golden scepter with a purple gem at the top
47.description: This scepter is imbued with the power of the mind, allowing the wielder to control the thoughts and actions of enemies

48.name: Whip of Necromancy
48.appearance: A black whip that seems to drain the life force from enemies
48.description: This whip is imbued with the power of necromancy, allowing the wielder to summon and control undead creatures

49.name: Hammer of Thunder
49.appearance: A massive hammer with a head made of crackling lightning
49.description: This hammer is imbued with the power of thunder, allowing the wielder to create sonic booms and devastating shockwaves

50.name: Shield of Force
50.appearance: A round shield made of shimmering blue energy
50.description: This shield is imbued with the power of force, allowing the wielder to block attacks with an impenetrable barrier and push enemies away with a powerful blast

51.name: Spear of Light
51.appearance: A spear with a shaft made of pure light and a pointed tip that glows with divine power
51.description: This spear is imbued with the power of light, allowing the wielder to smite enemies and heal allies with holy energy

52.name: Mace of Darkness
52.appearance: A mace with spikes made of shadow that seem to absorb light
52.description: This mace is imbued with the power of darkness, allowing the wielder to drain the life force of enemies and create areas of darkness that block sight

53.name: Rapier of Wind
53.appearance: A thin rapier with a blade made of air that shimmers in the breeze
53.description: This rapier is imbued with the power of wind, allowing the wielder to move with incredible speed and create powerful gusts that knock back enemies

54.name: Rod of Earth
54.appearance: A sturdy rod made of stone with intricate runes carved into its surface
54.description: This rod is imbued with the power of earth, allowing the wielder to create earthquakes and summon golems to do their bidding

55.name: Scythe of Death
55.appearance: A curved blade with a black handle that seems to be made of bones
55.description: This scythe is imbued with the power of death, allowing the wielder to reap the souls of enemies and summon spirits to fight alongside them

56.name: Glaive of Chaos
56.appearance: A two-handed polearm with a blade that seems to shift and change unpredictably
56.description: This glaive is imbued with the power of chaos, allowing the wielder to cause unpredictable and devastating effects on enemies and the surrounding environment

57.name: Dagger of the Void
57.appearance: A silver dagger with a blade that seems to shimmer and fade in and out of existence
57.description: This dagger is imbued with the power of the void, allowing the wielder to create portals to other dimensions and manipulate the fabric of reality

58.name: Bow of the Hunt
58.appearance: A wooden bow with intricate carvings of animals and nature
58.description: This bow is imbued with the power of the hunt, allowing the wielder to track and sense enemies with supernatural senses and shoot arrows that always hit their mark

59.name: Sword of the Elements
59.appearance: A longsword with a blade that seems to be made of a swirling mixture of fire, ice, and lightning
59.description: This sword is imbued with the power of the elements, allowing the wielder to unleash devastating elemental attacks on enemies and create powerful defensive barriers

60.name: Trident of the Sea
60.appearance: A trident with a shimmering blue shaft and a pointed tip that glows with the power of the ocean
60.description: This trident is imbued with the power of the sea, allowing the wielder to control water and summon powerful sea creatures to do their bidding

61.name: Health Potion
61.appearance: A small vial of red liquid

62.name: Mana Potion
62.appearance: A small vial of blue liquid

63.name: Stamina Potion
63.appearance: A small vial of yellow liquid

64.name: Antidote
64.appearance: A small vial of green liquid

65.name: Elixir of Strength
65.appearance: A small vial of purple liquid
65.description: Grants a temporary boost to strength when consumed

66.name: Elixir of Dexterity
66.appearance: A small vial of orange liquid
66.description: Grants a temporary boost to dexterity when consumed

67.name: Elixir of Intelligence
67.appearance: A small vial of dark blue liquid
67.description: Grants a temporary boost to intelligence when consumed

68.name: Elixir of Vitality
68.appearance: A small vial of pink liquid
68.description: Grants a temporary boost to vitality when consumed

69.name: Ghost Elixir
69.appearance: A small vial of transparent liquid

70.name: Elixir of Invisibility
70.appearance: A small vial of clear liquid

71.name: Tales of the Duskenwood
71.appearance: A leather-bound tome with intricate silver embossing
71.description: An anthology of eerie stories about the haunted Duskenwood

72.name: The Crystal Mage
72.appearance: A dusty old book with a cracked spine
72.description: A guide to the art of crystal magic, complete with diagrams and instructions

73.name: The Book of Shadows
73.appearance: A thick, black-bound book with no discernible title
73.description: A compendium of spells and incantations used by dark wizards and witches

74.name: The Silver Prince
74.appearance: A beautifully bound tome with silver filigree
74.description: A romantic tale of a prince who falls in love with a mysterious woman in silver

75.name: The Prophecies of the Oracle
75.appearance: A heavy, leather-bound book with gold lettering
75.description: A collection of prophecies and predictions made by a powerful oracle

76.name: The Dragon's Hoard
76.appearance: A large, illustrated book with a red cover
76.description: A guide to the hoards of dragons, their treasures, and how to obtain them

77.name: The Wizard's Grimoire
77.appearance: A thick, heavy book bound in green leather
77.description: A comprehensive guide to the art of wizardry and magic, complete with spells and incantations

78.name: The Lost Kingdoms
78.appearance: A weathered book with a faded map on the cover
78.description: A history of the lost kingdoms of the ancient world, with tales of great battles and magical artifacts

79.name: The Tome of Shadows
79.appearance: A black leather-bound book with silver runes
79.description: A forbidden book of dark magic, rumored to contain a powerful curse

80.name: The Star Weaver's Almanac
80.appearance: A beautifully illustrated book with a starry cover
80.description: A guide to the stars and the art of star weaving, complete with spells and rituals

91.name: Bread
91.description: A basic food item that restores a small amount of health when consumed

92.name: Leather Armor
92.description: Basic armor made from leather that provides some protection from physical attacks

93.name: Rope
93.description: A length of rope that can be used for a variety of purposes, such as climbing or tying things together

94.name: Torch
94.appearance: A wooden stick with a flaming end
94.description: Provides a source of light and heat when lit

95.name: Lockpick Set
95.description: A collection of tools used to pick locks

96.name: Fishing Rod
96.appearance: A fishing rod with a reel and line

97.name: Backpack
97.description: A bag used to carry items

98.name: Map
98.appearance: A map of the local area
98.description: Shows the geography and landmarks of the surrounding area

99.name: Bedroll
99.appearance: A roll of fabric used for sleeping

100.name: Water Flask
100.appearance: A metal flask filled with water
